Posts.Content: Jul 31, 2012 08:45PM bexH wrote: Just had my first chemo (Adria & cytox)  on July 23rd.  Hating the idea of going back on Monday.  5 days of misery with IV fluids needed and nausea & vomiting.  Anybody have problems with Neulasta shot?  I could barely lift my arm.  any advice?
Posts.Title: Starting Chemo July 2012 teeballmom SusanHG123

Posts.Content: Mar 20, 2014 09:35PM bexH wrote: curly, our breasts do change when we lose a lot of weight.  Try not to worry until you have something to worry about is what my onco nurses tell me.  It is still hard.  It could just be a asymmetrical cyst and that would explain why it compressed differently.  I lost my mom to lymphoma.  I am a triple negative IDC survivor.  Everything will be just fine.  Have faith.
Posts.Title: I got "called back" for additonal views. I'm very scared! curlynski edwards750
